text: One sunny day, Rocco saw a shiny piece of cheese rolling away. “I can grab it!” he thought. But his legs trembled with fear.
scene: Rocco, nervously twitching his whiskers, glancing at the delicious cheese near a laughing pig.

character.name: Rocco
character.description: A small, gray rat with big, bright eyes and a fluffy tail. He is timid and loves cheese but is afraid to talk to other animals.
